caption: Account Change
description: Account Change events report when specific user account management tasks are performed, such as a user/role being created, changed, deleted, renamed, disabled, enabled, locked out or unlocked.
name: account_change

3.caption: Password Change
3.description: An attempt was made to change an account's password.

4.caption: Password Reset
4.description: An attempt was made to reset an account's password.

9.caption: Lock
9.description: A user account was locked out.

http_request.description: Details about the underlying http request.

src_endpoint.description: Details about the source of the activity.

user.description: The user that was a target of an activity.
